ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Tome of Endless Enchanters
ygData.msgSnippet: You ll be spending a LONG time if you look for these on the jewelry vendors LOL Go to the Enchanter guilds.  They are sold there.  I know in West Freeport the
ygData.messageBody:
You'll be spending a LONG time if you look for these on the jewelry vendors LOL
 
Go to the Enchanter guilds.  They are sold there.  I know in West Freeport the vendor that sells it is the one outside, by the pond, that sells the peridots.
 
Happy Researching!! :)
 
Cherub Rose
60 Enchantress
Zeb Server
